alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Louis County through 700 PM CDT... At 631 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Biwabik, to 8 miles west of Whiteface Reservoir, to near Cotton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aurora around 640 PM CDT. Whiteface Reservoir around 650 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fairbanks, Wolf Lake, Boulder Lake and Brimson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis
